response.original_title: Xuanyuan Xiaodou: Immortal spirits & Demonic pets
response.overview: After picking up a spirit stone, the human girl Xiaodou accidentally awakens her system, summoning the guardian beast Bai Ze. She fights side by side with her spirit pet against the demonized villains to protect world peace!
response.title: Xuanyuan Xiaodou: Immortal spirits & Demonic pets
